description: Venti è il bardo di Mondstadt e la forma mortale di Barbatos, l'Anemo Archon. Eccelle nel controllo dei nemici e nel supporto tramite il suo potente Elemental Burst.

artifacts.name: Emblem of Severed Fate (2) + Viridescent Venerer (2)

info: Venti è uno dei migliori crowd control del gioco. Costruiscilo con Maestria Elementale per massimizzare i danni da Swirl e Ricarica Energia per un Burst costante.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Divine Marksmanship
skills.desc: Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 6 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Anemo DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Skyward Sonnet
skills.desc: Venti summons a Wind Domain at the enemy's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.
skills.details_html:
Press
Summons a Wind Domain at the enemy's location, dealing AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.
Hold
Summons an even larger Wind Domain with Venti as the epicenter, dealing greater AoE Anemo DMG and launching enemies into the air.

skills.name: Wind's Grand Ode
skills.desc: Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in objects and enemies, dealing continuous Anemo DMG.
skills.details_html:
Wind's Grand Ode
Fires off an arrow made of countless coalesced winds, creating a huge Stormeye that sucks in objects and enemies, dealing continuous Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption: If the Stormeye comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type.

passive_talents.name: Embrace of Winds
passive_talents.desc: Holding Skyward Sonnet creates an upcurrent that lasts for 20s.

passive_talents.name: Stormeye
passive_talents.desc: Regenerates 15 Energy for Venti after the effects of Wind's Grand Ode end. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, also restores 15 Energy to all characters of that corresponding element.

passive_talents.name: Windrider
passive_talents.desc: Decreases gliding Stamina consumption for your own party members by 20%.

constellations.name: Splitting Gales
constellations.desc: Fires 2 additional arrows per Aimed Shot, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.desc: Skyward Sonnet decreases enemies' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Wind's Grand Ode by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.desc: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Skyward Sonnet by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.desc: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, their RES towards the corresponding element is also decreased by 20%.
